plot: To fix the cracks in the foundations of his family, a man diagnosed with kidney cancer fights with his faith to learn where he's from.
title: Where I'm From
plot_es: To fix the cracks in the foundations of his family, a man diagnosed with kidney cancer fights with his faith to learn where he's from.
plot_en: To fix the cracks in the foundations of his family, a man diagnosed with kidney cancer fights with his faith to learn where he's from.
